name: another wish
description:
" I don't remember how I got here.

I feel like I should know,

but it's slipping away. "

'another wish' follows the story of Eli, who has no memory of how he ends up in a strange place, with his only companion being a strange creature. 

Uncover Eli's story as you solve puzzles, and navigate through the maze. 

'another wish' is an experimental project mixing 2D hand illustrations and 3D models into a 3D game. There are also bonus hidden objects and locations that can be obtained by chance encounter, so hope you get lucky! 

DEVELOPER'S NOTE : This is my first full game done in Unity, so there are going to be bugs and issues. Please play it gently, else the texts will start overlapping each other. If it goes wrong, quit the application and restart it again. Thank you for the interest in this game and sorry for the inconveniences!
